summary:
[Updated Version - 1000 Septims and moved her to the Bannered Mare]
Destiny Blaise will buy your stolen goods and supply you with \'Calling Cards\' that you can leave on the body of those you kill. She can be found in \'The Bannered Mare\' in Whiterun (see pics)
descriptionHtml:
[Updated Version - Moved her to The Bannered Mare - now has 1000 Septims]
Destiny Blaise will buy your stolen goods and supply you with \'Calling Cards\' that you can leave on the body of those you kill. She can now be found in \'The Bannered Mare\' in Whiterun (see pics). This version uses a .png file to create the card...you are now able to modify the .png file as you see fit, so you can customise the calling card to your liking with any good paint program (Gimp, Photoshop etc).  ----The Older versions are available to download - just click download button and select the one you want **** KUDOS for all who Endorse me ****
author: crusader58
